div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 696 Kiourpet, Samothrace, 1930 (565) Burial: c. 470 B.C. Contents: c. 100 AR Samothrace: 1 st.; remainder triob. and smaller fr. Disposition: New York 15 (incl. Jameson 2443); Empedocles 8; Naville July 3, 1933, 959-64; Jameson 2441-4 Schwabacher, TINC, (London), pp. 109-20; ANSMN 5 (1952), pp. 49-51
